On Thu, Apr 22, 201=
0 at 11:49 AM, Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com> wrote:


=C2=A0 







I think par=
t of the animosity between the scientist/skeptic and the paranormalist/ bel=
iever, is that they are speaking a different language, and often don=E2=80=
=99t know it.


Both come up with theories. =C2=A0And these may lead to con=
clusions. =C2=A0A scientist frames this as part of the scientific method, a=
nd expects a lot of work to be done between the theory and the conclusions.=
 =C2=A0A believer often starts with a theory, =C2=A0and then states new thi=
ngs based on that. =C2=A0The scientist interprets the believer=E2=80=99s st=
atements as the believers =E2=80=98conclusions=E2=80=99, and is appalled at=
 the lack of process that got the believer from theory to conclusion. =C2=
=A0


The believer is appalled at the scientist's closed mind. =C2=A0But in=
 fact, the believer did not mean their statements to actually be conclusion=
s, in the scientific sense. =C2=A0=C2=A0The believer thinks about their the=
ories, maybe tests them, and more often than not, comes up with new THEORIE=
S. =C2=A0But by not stating that these are theories, the scientist sees the=
m as conclusions (since they seemed to flow from theory and testing). =C2=
=A0And hence, the friction between these camps.


So I think both parties s=
hare some of the blame. =C2=A0The scientist assumes the believer understand=
s the scientific method, and is making conclusions from the scientific meth=
od, when the believer may really just be detailing more theories. =C2=A0The=
 believer watches scientific-looking tv shows, uses scientific-looking equi=
pment, and uses scientific-sounding words like =E2=80=98theory=E2=80=99 and=
 =E2=80=98evidence=E2=80=99, without realizing this casts them into the sci=
entific method in the ears of the scientific community.


What to do? =C2=
=A0I think if the scientist/skeptic more often asked things like =E2=80=9CA=
re you sure of that, or is that a theory?=E2=80=9D, and the paranormalist/ =
believer used the word =E2=80=98theory=E2=80=99 a lot more in their proclam=
ations, it would go a long way toward less hostilities.
